name: NeonSurfers
description:
NeonSurfers is the first game of our indie studio in the runner genre, in which you have to catch up with the bus in order to go to work on it. On your way there will be obstacles that you have to pass. Along the way, you'll collect coins for which you can acquire new characters. Unlock all the characters and set new records in the game. Good luck. Supplier: YGS67

Communication with the developer: VK - https://vk.com/stuntnigga11
